attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay up to date with the election and what actually happened was unimaginable. So I noticed when I first opened the app, it asked me to allow notifications, typical, but it also asked me to allow my microphone. I was hesitant, but allowed it. The more I used the app, the more I noticed there was no feature in which a microphone would be needed. I was sketched out, but forgot about it. So, I recently adopted a new cat and I often call her â€œbaby.â€ I do not have a baby, I donâ€™t live in a household with babies and I most certainly NEVER search for baby products because itâ€™s not necessary. But all of a sudden, I started getting multiple ads for baby clothes and supplies throughout my games and social media! I started to suspect this app was listening to me, so I decided to test out the theory. I had a fake conversation with my mom with the app open, in which I described I wanted to buy a Barbie dream house ( I do not play with or talk about barbies, ever). The VERY NEXT DAY... across all of my games and social media apps, were BARBIE ads!! I could not believe it. I finally decided to delete the app because I was so sketched out. I wish it ended there but thereâ€™s more. The very next day after deleting the app, I started getting a lot of spam phone calls, more than usual. It got to being at least one per hour. Some of the area codes were very strange and many of them were not from the US. After a week, I decided to look up the area code of where the most recent call was from and I kid you not... the call was from Russia. I started blocking all of these numbers, but it didnâ€™t do much good because calls would come from new numbers every day, and at least one each day was from Russia. Iâ€™ve been tempted to answer one of them, but Iâ€™m simply too scared at this point. Iâ€™m not sure what to do now, Iâ€™ve been calling my cell company and they said this was all very weird and I should consider changing my number. Iâ€™m leaving this review in hopes that NO ONE ELSE downloads this app and goes through this. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
